page.title: 15COMPUTERS,ANNAN
page.content: In the past few years home computers have become very popular with children.In a survey carried out amongst the top three classes in our school it was found that more than half of the children owned computers. The most common type is the ZX Spectrum which is cheaper than other makes. We were interested in finding out what use was made of computers.We found that nearly one half of those with computers rarely use them.Those who did, used them solely for playing games.The most popular game at the moment is"In Aid of Africa".This game is being sold to raise money for famine victims in Ethiopia and Sudan. Will computers maintain their popularity or will they be just be a passing craze like skateboards and hula hoops? Only time will tell.
